page.title: 12HOME LIFE 2
page.content: Then it's what we've all been waiting for, THE BELL. Out to play! And it's running round the playground crashing into people, rushing round screaming and laughing. Hopefully there's a good fight to watch. Then it's the whistle and back inside the prison.Groan.More work, in fact it's work, work, work! Great, it's lunch-time, pity about the school dinners though. After lunch we run about on the field, but before you've had time to get started on a really good game it's back inside and more work,work,work. By this time I'm really tired and it's a relief when the final bell goes at last! When I get home my dog jumps up on me and licks my face at least he's happy! Then it's time for a cup of tea and sit down to watch T.V. I have my supper and (yawn) go to bed. Goodnight!
